title: He's still transferring some jobs to Mexico, despite the Trump deal.
subtitle: A letter from Carrier's company to the employees at their Indianapolis factory cautions that some jobs will continue to be transferred despite a deal with President-elect Trump.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Despite an agreement with President-elect Donald Trump to maintain 1,000 manufacturing jobs in the United States, Carrier says that it will still transfer hundreds of jobs to Mexico.
